items.title: Assess repository and derive implementation slices

narrative.Background: Need to implement SPECIFICATION.md in an unknown current repository state.
narrative.Problem: Cannot safely implement without first mapping existing files, tooling, and constraints.

items.title: Scaffold app/tooling for Next.js static TypeScript workflow

narrative.Background: Specification requires Next.js static-export workflow with quality tooling.
narrative.Problem: Project may be missing baseline app and automation needed for implementation.

items.title: Implement core domain, validation, and ranking engine with tests

narrative.Background: Core business logic must follow PDF semantics and strict constraints.
narrative.Problem: Need deterministic rules and comprehensive tests before UI integration.

items.title: Implement visual editor interactions and accessibility

narrative.Background: Spec requires fixed visual template, dual arrow modes, and WCAG-focused flows.
narrative.Problem: Need to deliver interactive UX with validation, ranking output, and undo/redo.

items.title: Implement persistence abstraction and strict vbrief export

narrative.Background: Spec mandates local IndexedDB persistence plus repository abstraction and strict export.
narrative.Problem: Need durable local saves while preserving architecture for future server adapter.

items.title: Set up static deployment workflow and run quality gates

narrative.Background: Spec requires static deployment via Cloudflare Pages and full quality verification.
narrative.Problem: Need CI/deploy configuration and passing checks to complete implementation.
